text.page:
376
102-188b @#/ /'phags pa rims dang srog chags kyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM dza dza re/ par+Na sha ba ri swA hA/ na maHsid+ha byA g+h+ra/ rak+Shu ta rak+Shu/ kha thin drA me kha me kha/ tsan+ti ti ba ta ye/ ro ga ni dI pa sa ta ye swA hA/ dril bu la lan bdun sngags te/ gang gis sa phyogs su dkrol ba dang / bya dang / gcan gzan dang / srin bu dang / byi ba dang / rims nad thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /rims dang srog chags kyis mi tshugs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //
